description.value:
As much as you might care for them, you've come to terms with the ephemeral nature of non-elves, and it makes their threats feel less troublesome.

If a non-elf rolls a failure on a check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Coerce]{Coerce} you using Intimidation, it gets a critical failure instead (and thus can't try to Coerce you again for 1 week).

When a non-elf attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Demoralize]{Demoralize} you, you become temporarily immune for 1 day, instead of 10 minutes.
